General.Name: Oeneo SA
General.Description: Oeneo SA operates in the wine industry worldwide. The company manufactures and sale of cork closures. It also provides products and solutions in wine making and spirits. Oeneo SA is headquartered in Bordeaux, France. Oeneo SA operates as a subsidiary of Caspar SAS.

0.Title: MD of Oeneo Group, MD of Diam Bouchage & Chairman of Directors of Piedade
